field.filter: SELECT AzureSubscription AS s JOIN Organization AS root ON s.org_id = root.id JOIN Organization AS child ON child.parent_id BELOW root.id WHERE child.id = :this->org_id
SELECT AzureSubscription AS s JOIN Organization AS root ON s.org_id = root.id JOIN Organization AS child ON child.parent_id BELOW root.id WHERE child.id = :this->org_id

neighbour.query_up: SELECT AzureDBServer AS s JOIN AzureMariaDB AS db ON db.azuredbserver_id = s.id WHERE s.id = :this->id UNION SELECT AzureDBServer AS s JOIN AzurePostgreSQL AS db ON db.azuredbserver_id = s.id WHERE s.id = :this->id UNION SELECT AzureDBServer AS s JOIN AzureMySQL AS db ON db.azuredbserver_id = s.id WHERE s.id = :this->id UNION SELECT AzureDBServer AS s JOIN AzureMSSQL AS db ON db.azuredbserver_id = s.id WHERE s.id = :this->id
neighbour.query_down: SELECT AzureMariaDB WHERE azuredbserver_id = :this->id UNION SELECT AzurePostgreSQL WHERE azuredbserver_id = :this->id UNION SELECT AzureMySQL WHERE azuredbserver_id = :this->id UNION SELECT AzureMSSQL WHERE azuredbserver_id = :this->id

field.filter: SELECT AzureDBServer WHERE type = 'mariadb' AND org_id = :this->org_id AND azuresubscription_id = :this->azuresubscription_id AND azureresourcegroup_id = :this->azureresourcegroup_id

neighbour.query_down: SELECT AzureMariaDB AS db JOIN AzureDBServer AS s ON db.azuredbserver_id = s.id WHERE db.id = :this->id

neighbour.query_down: SELECT AzurePostgreSQL AS db JOIN AzureDBServer AS s ON db.azuredbserver_id = s.id WHERE db.id = :this->id
